AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: big horned
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s horns show that [PAWN_pronoun] belongs to the strongest of the beasts. Larger horns are carried with pride; proof that [PAWN_pronoun] is blessed with strength and stands above the lesser kin.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: mutant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was turned by chaos in [PAWN_possessive] middle years. Once the realization set in of what [PAWN_pronoun] had become, [PAWN_pronoun] embraced the new emotion and became as violent and ornry as the rest of the beasts.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: mutant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born a mutant. [PAWN_pronoun] was left in the wild by loving human parents, and was found by a roving beast herd that took [PAWN_objective] in.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: raider
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is cut from the same cloth as the rest of the herd. [PAWN_pronoun] loves causing mayhem and destruction.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: thrall
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] performs menial task for the herd, and is generally treated as a peon. This causing [PAWN_objective] much frustration, and [PAWN_pronoun] takes that out on any one lesser than [PAWN_objective]self.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: grunt
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an average rough and vile Gor. Tough, ornry, and always ready to fight.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wildling
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a gor to a human family. [PAWN_pronoun] was left in the wilds like so many other mutant children, and was rescued by a nearby gor herd that heard the mutant child calling.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: herd born
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a gor, to beastman parents. The only life [PAWN_pronoun] ever knew is one with the herd.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: strange
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a mutant. Abandoned like so many other mutants, [PAWN_pronoun] was left to die or fend for [PAWN_objective]self in the wild. [PAWN_nameDef] was stranger than the rest of the mutant children, having a mind touched by chaos throwing [PAWN_objective] into a mania from time to time.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: farm child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't born as a mutant. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up as a farmer's child. [PAWN_nameDef] was corrupted by chaos in [PAWN_possessive] mid 20s, and ran off to the woods where [PAWN_pronoun] joined a wandering beast herd.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rich child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't born as a mutant, but was born into a rich human family. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood studying the arts of a aristocrat. [PAWN_nameDef] was turned by chaos later in life during a chaos storm, and joined herd after having lived in the wilds alone for a short time.
